content.text:
I'm ready to help! I understand the SPLICE project architecture and the context provided in CLAUDE.md. I'm operating in read-only mode and can:

- Search for files using glob patterns
- Search code with grep and regex
- Read and analyze file contents
- Run read-only bash commands

I have access to the full SPLICE codebase at `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE` and understand the project consists of:
- splice-backend (Express.js API on Railway)
- splice-cep (Adobe CEP panel)
- splice-plugin (UXP plugin)
- splice-website (Next.js frontend)
- video-generator (video processing utilities)

I'm familiar with the authentication flow, token blacklist architecture, CSRF protection, email verification, and the production deployment setup on Railway.

How can I help you search through or analyze the codebase?
